title: Bullied Omega
description: Vera is alone in a strange academic institution after her planet is destroyed and its people are subjugated. She does not fit with the privileged and wealthy populace of the prestigious space city. Especially since one person in particular was making it difficult to integrate. Still, grateful for the chance to learn, she attempts to keep her head down and her nose to the grindstone. Alpha Prince Edmund seems intent to remind her daily, however, of everything that she has lost and everything she still stands to lose. A Dark and Extreme Romance.+++ FOR MATURE AUDIENCES ONLY 18 YRS OR OLDER +++CAUTION: MATERIAL INCLUDES DOMINANCE AND SUBMISSION, DUBIOUS CONSENT, ANAL, DEGRADATION KINK, PRAISE KINK, VERBAL HUMILIATION, GAPING, AND MASOCHISM
author: Maeve Zaal
